aircraft.value: Hawk Defender - AC-7561-869 at Regional Depot-C

defect_observed.value: Canopy seal deterioration. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.

root_cause.value: Inadequate maintenance procedure resulting in improper installation

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Tail Assembly component. Physical examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.

corrective_action.value: Repair damaged area using approved repair scheme

remarks_investigation.value: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.

remarks_design.value: Detailed analysis indicates design margins are adequate. Failure attributed to operational factors. Concur with findings. Date: 17/10/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Sqn Ldr H.S. Bhatia

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality control procedures verified. Recommend periodic surveillance of manufacturing facility. Date: 18/10/2023 Signature: Dr. S.M. Kulkarni

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User feedback incorporated. Recommend enhanced crew training on system operation and limitations. Date: 19/10/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr H.S. Bhatia

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) From quality standpoint, root cause analysis is thorough. Corrective measures are appropriate. Concur. Date: 24/10/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr B.P. Gupta

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Airworthiness implications assessed. Recommend issuance of technical directive for fleet-wide compliance. Date: 24/10/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel
